channel.title: How do you change the maximum players?
channel.description:
Hello, how would I go about changing the maximum amount of players allowed on my server? I've tried changing the maxConnections int in server.java, but I'm not positive if thats what I need to do. :|
-thanks

item.title: How do you change the maximum players?
item.dc:creator: @_Mod_Dude |Mod Dude|
item.description:
@_Mod_Dude wrote:

open playerhandler.java and search for

public static final int maxPlayers

then change the number to what you want like

public static final int maxPlayers = 50;

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change the maximum players?

@ancientday wrote:

i think that has to do with your computer
